meanings.sent1: The feudaries in the kingdom were respected by all.
meanings.sent2: The feudaries managed the lands granted to them by the king.
meanings.sent3: The feudaries had a meeting to discuss the upcoming harvest festival.
meanings.sent4: The feudaries' power was like a shield protecting the realm.
meanings.sent5: The image of the feudaries in their armor was etched in the villagers' minds.

meanings.sent1: The brave feudaries defended their fiefs from invaders.
meanings.sent2: The wealthy feudaries owned vast estates in the countryside.
meanings.sent3: The feudaries decided to host a grand feast on their fiefs.
meanings.sent4: The fiefs under the control of the feudaries flourished with prosperity.
meanings.sent5: The colorful banners of the feudaries fluttered proudly on their fiefs.

meanings.definition: A person who owes allegiance to a feudal lord
meanings.sent1: The loyal feudaries swore their allegiance to the noble lord.
meanings.sent2: The humble feudaries served their lord with unwavering loyalty.
meanings.sent3: The feudaries organized a surprise celebration for their lord's birthday.
meanings.sent4: The bond between the feudaries and their lord was unbreakable.
meanings.sent5: The feast hosted by the feudaries was a symbol of their allegiance to the lord.
